column2: UPDATE 2-Time Warner Cable says it lost customers from blackout Sept 11 A Time Warner Cable Inc  executive said the pay TV operator lost subscribers during a month-long blackout of CBS Corp in three major markets
column3: while the broadcast network's CEO said it suffered no financial harm from rate dispute.

column2: UPDATE 1-U.S. central bankers criticize SEC's money-market proposals Sept 12 Heads of the 12 U.S. Federal Reserve regional banks on Thursday strongly criticized a component of a U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission proposal aimed at preventing runs on money-market funds
column3: saying it does little to change current rules.
